com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block

Class BlockId

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block.BlockId

  • public class BlockId
extends Object
    A utility class to represent a block type along with optional data.
    Author:
    nitnelave

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlockId(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      Get the id and data from a block.
      BlockId(int id)
      Only id is specified, data comparison accepts any value.
      BlockId(int id, byte data)
      Id and data are specified.
      BlockId(int id, byte data, boolean hasData)
      Id and data are specified, and hasData specifies if the data is used.
      BlockId(String str)
      Constructor from string.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlockId

        public BlockId(int id)
        Only id is specified, data comparison accepts any value.
        Parameters:
        id - The block id.

      • BlockId

        public BlockId(int id,
               byte data)
        Id and data are specified. If data == -1, then it is considered as unspecified.
        Parameters:
        id - The block id.
        data - The block data.

      • BlockId

        public BlockId(int id,
               byte data,
               boolean hasData)
        Id and data are specified, and hasData specifies if the data is used.
        Parameters:
        id - The block id.
        data - The block data.
        hasData - Whether the data should be used in comparing.

      • BlockId

        public BlockId(String str)
        throws NumberFormatException
        Constructor from string. The string is parsed in an attempt to get the info. The string format accepted is a simple number for just the id, or id:data for both.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to be parsed.
        Throws:
        NumberFormatException - If the string does not match any pattern.

      • BlockId

        public BlockId(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Get the id and data from a block.
        Parameters:
        block - The block.
